avdta.gui.util

Class GraphicUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.gui.util.GraphicUtils

  • public abstract class GraphicUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static methods to align Components. It uses a table based method: each Component has a x and y location of the top left corner, as well as a width and height specifying the number of rows and columns occupied. Note that Components specified to overlap will visually overlap. This class should only be used with Containers using a GridBagLayout. If the layout is different (see Container.setLayout(java.awt.LayoutManager)), this class will throw a ClassCastException.

      • constrain

        public static void constrain(java.awt.Container container,
                             java.awt.Component component,
                             int grid_x,
                             int grid_y,
                             int grid_width,
                             int grid_height)
        Adds the component at the specified row and column with the specified width and height. Borders between components are set at 2 pixels. The alignment is GridBagConstraints.NORTHWEST.
        Parameters:
        container - the container
        component - the component
        grid_x - the column
        grid_y - the row
        grid_width - the width
        grid_height - the height

      • drawImage

        public static void drawImage(java.awt.Graphics window,
                             java.awt.Image image,
                             int x,
                             int y,
                             int width,
                             int height)
        Draws the image in the specified Graphics with the given maximum width and height. The image will be scaled, constrained by the maximum width and height, and drawn centered.
        Parameters:
        window - the Graphics to draw in
        image - the Image to be drawn
        x - the x location (px)
        y - the y location (px)
        width - the maximum width (px)
        height - the maximum height (px)
